name: Lexus LC 500h
description: The price of Lexus LC 500h, a 4 seater Coupe, ranges from Rs. 2.39  - 2.51 Crore. It is available in 2 variants, with an engine of 3456 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. LC 500h comes with 8 airbags. Lexus LC 500h has a ground clearance of 140 mm  and is available in 10 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 14.8 kmpl for LC 500h.

variants.variant_name: LC 500h Sport Plus 3456 cc, Hybrid (Electric + Petrol), Automatic (e-CVT), 14.8 kmpl, 295 bhp
LC 500h Limited Edition 3456 cc, Hybrid (Electric + Petrol), Automatic (e-CVT), 14.8 kmpl, 295 bhp
